availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: M. D. West (Quartermaster-general of Kentucky in 1861)

body.p: Kentucky soldier and prison inspector. Quartermaster general of the Commonwealth of Kentucky from August 1859 to October 1861. Commissioned as a prison inspector by Governor Magoffin on October 30, 1861.

ab.bibl:
Lewis Collins and Richard H. Collins, Collins' Historical Sketches of Kentucky , vol. 1 (Covington, Ky.: Collins & Co., 1882), 91, 96.
“Annual Report of the Auditor of Public Accounts of the State of Kentucky, for the Fiscal Year Ending October 10, 1859,” (Frankfort, Ky.: Jno. B. Major, State Printer, 1860), 288.
"Beriah Magoffin, Executive Journal, Commission, M. D. West," November 19, 1861, Office of the Governor, Beriah Magoffin: Governor's official correspondence file, executive journal, 1859-1862, MGEJ-261, Kentucky Department for Libraries and Archives, Frankfort, KY. Accessed via the Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition, KYR-0001-025-0266.
"Major M. D. West," _The Louisville Daily Journal (Louisville, Ky.), March 1, 1866.
Find A Grave, "M. D. West (1816-1866)," Memorial #60293665, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/60293665/m-d-west (accessed January 30, 2018).
